2.flavor_text: "Oh, blast it all—I can't make up my mind."

2.name: Merlin
2.text: LOOK BEFORE YOU LEAP When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
2.flavor_text: "You can't always trust to luck, boy."

2.name: Peter Pan's Shadow
2.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
TIPTOE Your other characters with Rush gain Evasive.

2.name: Pinocchio
2.flavor_text:
"With that personality, that profile, that physique... Why, I can see your name in lights, lights six feet high."
—Honest John

2.name: Pinocchio
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Pinocchio.)
LISTEN TO YOUR CONSCIENCE When you play this character, you may return chosen character or item with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.
2.flavor_text: He raced into the Inklands without a thought.

2.name: Pinocchio
2.text: TELLING LIES When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character.
2.flavor_text:
"A lie keeps growing and growing until it's as plain as the nose on your face."
—Blue Fairy

2.name: Winnie the Pooh
2.flavor_text: He'd always felt a kinship with honey. They were both golden, and sweet, and likely to end up in sticky situations.

2.name: Yzma
2.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.)
CRUEL IRONY When you play this character, shuffle another chosen character card into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.

2.name: Yzma
2.flavor_text:
Yzma: "Llamas! All I see when I close my eyes is llamas!"
Kronk: "Weird. I just saw one in the flood. Poor little guy."

2.name: Gruesome and Grim
2.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Play a character with cost 4 or less for free. They gain Rush. At the end of the turn, banish them. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

2.name: I'm Stuck!
2.text: Chosen exerted character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
2.flavor_text: "Oh, bother—not again."

2.name: Legend of the Sword in the Stone
2.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {S} while challenging.)
2.flavor_text:
A legend is sung of when England was young
And knights were brave and bold

2.name: Binding Contract
2.text: FOR ALL ETERNITY {E}, {E} one of your characters — Exert chosen character.
2.flavor_text: Just a standard form, nothing to worry about.

2.name: Croquet Mallet
2.text: HURTLING HEDGEHOG Banish this item — Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

2.name: Perplexing Signposts
2.text: TO WONDERLAND Banish this item — Return chosen character of yours to your hand.
2.flavor_text:
Alice: "I just wanted to ask you which way I ought to go."
Cheshire Cat: "Well, that depends on where you want to get to."

2.name: The Sorcerer's Spellbook
2.text: KNOWLEDGE {E}, 1 {I} — Gain 1 lore.
2.flavor_text: Illumineers seek the power of knowledge—but must be aware of the price.

2.name: Arthur
2.flavor_text:
"It's not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade."
—Merlin

2.name: Beast
2.text: SECOND WIND Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

2.name: Belle
2.text: USE YOUR IMAGINATION While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2 {L}.
2.flavor_text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.

2.name: Belle
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
THORNY ARROWS Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character's player discards all cards in their hand.
2.flavor_text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.

2.name: Bucky
2.text: SQUEAK Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, each opponent chooses and discards a card.
2.flavor_text:
"There's a lot of nuance to squirrel."
—Kronk

2.name: Cheshire Cat
2.flavor_text:
Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?"
"Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be quite a change if they didn't."

2.name: Cheshire Cat
2.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WICKED SMILE {E} — Banish chosen damaged character.

2.name: Daisy Duck
2.text: THWART Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

2.name: Donald Duck
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.)
ALLOW ME At the start of your turn, each player may draw a card.

2.name: Donald Duck
2.text: STARTLED AWAKE Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {S} this turn.
2.flavor_text: Heading toward a rude awakening!

2.name: Dr. Facilier
2.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
YOU'RE IN MY WORLD Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

2.name: Enchantress
2.text: TRUE FORM While being challenged, this character gets +2 {S}.
2.flavor_text: Appearances can be deceiving.

2.name: Flynn Rider
2.flavor_text: "I love a good fan club, but they could at least try to get the nose right!"

2.name: Flynn Rider
2.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ONE LAST, BIG SCORE This character gets -1 {L} for each card in your opponents' hands.

2.name: Gaston
2.text: YES, I'M INTIMIDATING While one or more opponents have no cards in their hands, this character gets +3 {S}.
2.flavor_text: "Don't I deserve the best?"

2.name: Little John
2.flavor_text: "What's the rush, Rob? Take a load off! There's plenty of time to go lookin' for lore lost in that crazy ink."

2.name: Lucifer
2.text: MOUSE CATCHER When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards either 2 cards or 1 action card.
2.flavor_text:
"There must be something good about him."
—Cinderella

2.name: Pain
2.text: COMING, YOUR MOST LUGUBRIOUSNESS While this character has 5 {S} or more, he gets +2 {L}.
2.flavor_text:
"Get a move on! I'm a busy god, lots to do—meetings, curses, a little light scheming."
—Hades

2.name: Panic
2.text: I CAN HANDLE IT When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. If the chosen character is named Pain, he gets +4 {S} instead.
2.flavor_text:
"Who says it's hard to find good help these days? Oh, yeah... ME!"
—Hades

2.name: Pete
2.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
TAKE THAT! Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {S} this turn.
WHO'S NEXT? While this character has 7 {S} or more, he gets +2 {L}.

2.name: Prince John
2.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
I SENTENCE YOU Whenever your opponent discards 1 or more cards, you may draw a card for each card discarded.
2.flavor_text: "Taxes! Taxes! Beautiful, lovely taxes!"

2.name: Queen of Hearts
2.text: ROYAL RAGE When you play this character, deal 1 damage to chosen damaged opposing character.
2.flavor_text:
"You know, we could make her really angry. Shall we try?"
—Cheshire Cat

2.name: Ratigan
2.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
2.flavor_text: "I've outdone myself this time! Soon I will have everything I deserve. Riches... power... an entire kingdom at my feet!"

2.name: Ray
2.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
2.flavor_text: He may be hard to follow, but his heart isn't.

2.name: The Queen
2.text: A PERFECT DISGUISE {E}, Choose and discard a character card — Gain lore equal to the discarded character's {L}.
2.flavor_text: "This is no ordinary apple..."

2.name: Tiana
2.flavor_text: Finding your true self will set your heart aglow.

2.name: Virana
2.flavor_text: "I must make the hard decisions to protect my daughter, especially in this unfamiliar world."

2.name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
2.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character of yours to your hand to play another character with the same cost or less for free.
2.flavor_text: It'll do magic, believe it or not

2.name: Bounce
2.text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.
2.flavor_text:
"Are you ready for some bouncing?"
—Tigger

2.name: Hypnotize
2.text: Each opponent chooses and discards a card. Draw a card.
2.flavor_text: "Look me in the eye when I'm speaking to you."

2.name: Improvise
2.text: Chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn. Draw a card.
2.flavor_text:
Shan-Yu: "It looks like you're out of ideas."
Mulan: "Not quite!"

2.name: Pack Tactics
2.text: Gain 1 lore for each damaged character opponents have in play.
2.flavor_text:
Pacha: "You want to survive the jungle? Start thinking like you belong here."
Kuzco: "No problem... Grrr, look at me, I'm a jaguar."

2.name: Ring the Bell
2.text: Banish chosen damaged character.
2.flavor_text:
"I'm afraid that you've gone and upset me."
—Ratigan

2.name: Ratigan's Marvelous Trap
2.text: SNAP! BOOM! TWANG! Banish this item — Each opponent loses 2 lore.
2.flavor_text: Simple in purpose, elaborate in execution—just like Ratigan.

2.name: Baloo
2.flavor_text: "The bees are buzzin' in the tree to make some honey just for me!"

2.name: Boun
2.flavor_text: "If you see any hungry faces, send 'em my way."

2.name: Card Soldiers
2.flavor_text: You'll have to deal with them sooner or later.

2.name: Donald Duck
2.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHOOEY! This character gets +1 {L} for each 1 damage on him.

2.name: Felicia
2.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
2.flavor_text:
"This isn't how most cat-and-mouse games go, is it, Dr. Dawson?"
—Basil

2.name: Fidget
2.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
2.flavor_text: When a normal henchman just won't cut it.

2.name: Honest John
2.text: EASY STREET Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
2.flavor_text: "A thing like that ought to be worth a fortune to someone!"

2.name: Lady Tremaine
2.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady Tremaine.)
POWER TO RULE AT LAST When you play this character, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.
2.flavor_text: The twelfth Rule of Villainy: If you don't have a throne, take one.

2.name: Lady Tremaine
2.text: NOT FOR YOU When you play this character, each opponent with more lore than you loses 1 lore.
2.flavor_text: "Make no mistake: this time I will make certain the key remains safe!"

2.name: Lumiere
2.flavor_text: When things heat up, no one can hold a candle to him.

2.name: Minnie Mouse
2.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
2.flavor_text: "This goes into my top ten most fun things!"

2.name: Minnie Mouse
2.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
UNDERSEA ADVENTURE Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 {L} this turn.

2.name: Minnie Mouse
2.flavor_text: Zero to fun in under three seconds!

2.name: Mother Gothel
2.text: WHAT HAVE YOU DONE?! This character enters play with 3 damage.
2.flavor_text: Her feelings are written all over her face.

2.name: Mulan
2.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
2.flavor_text: "I have to do something!"

2.name: Namaari
2.text: THIS SHOULDN'T TAKE LONG {E}, Banish this character — Banish chosen character.
2.flavor_text: "I don't need swords to beat you. They just make it more fun."

2.name: Queen of Hearts
2.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
2.flavor_text:
The glow of lore in the flood caught her eye.
"The spellbook!" she cried. "Don't let it get away!"

2.name: Queen of Hearts
2.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.)
LET THE GAME BEGIN Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, you may draw a card.

2.name: Ratigan
2.text: THIS IS MY KINGDOM When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 3 {S} or less. Choose one of your characters and ready them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
2.flavor_text: "This time, nothing, not even Basil, can stand in my way!"

2.name: Raya
2.text: NOTE TO SELF, DON'T DIE During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. She can't quest for the rest of this turn.
2.flavor_text: Two parts bravery, one part cleverness, and a whole lot of determination.

2.name: Raya
2.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Raya.)
CHAMPION OF KUMANDRA Whenever this character challenges a damaged character, she takes no damage from the challenge.

2.name: Raya
2.flavor_text: "My ba dreams of a united Kumandra. I fight to honor that dream."

2.name: Scar
2.text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
DADDY ISN'T HERE TO SAVE YOU During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

2.name: Shere Khan
2.text: DON'T INSULT MY INTELLIGENCE Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.
2.flavor_text: The sixth Rule of Villainy: Keep your mind sharp and your claws sharper.

2.name: Tigger
2.text: ENERGETIC Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {S} this turn.
2.flavor_text: Bouncing in to save the day!

2.name: Tuk Tuk
2.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
2.flavor_text: A good friend is always ready to roll.

2.name: Go the Distance
2.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Draw a card.

2.name: Teeth and Ambitions
2.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.
2.flavor_text:
Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected
To take certain duties on board

2.name: The Most Diabolical Scheme
2.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen Villain of yours to banish chosen character.
2.flavor_text:
Now comes the real tour de force
Tricky and wicked, of course

2.name: What Did You Call Me?
2.text: Chosen damaged character gets +3 {S} this turn.
2.flavor_text:
"No one can have a higher opinion of you than I have, and I think you're a slimy, contemptible sewer rat!"
—Basil

2.name: You Can Fly!
2.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

2.name: Dinner Bell
2.text: YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENS {E}, 2 {I} — Draw cards equal to the damage on chosen character of yours, then banish them.
2.flavor_text: The delicate sound of impending doom.

2.name: Peter Pan's Dagger
2.text: Your characters with Evasive get +1 {S}.
2.flavor_text: Like so much other lore, Peter Pan's dagger was safe in the Great Illuminary until the flood.

2.name: Sword in the Stone
2.text: {E}, 2 {I} — Chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn for each 1 damage on them.
2.flavor_text: "Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England."

2.name: Alice
2.text:
GOOD ADVICE Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
WHAT DID I DO? While this character has 10 {S} or more, she gets +4 {L}.

2.name: Basil
2.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
THERE'S ALWAYS A CHANCE If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.
2.flavor_text: A solution always presents itself.

2.name: Basil
2.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
2.flavor_text: "What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below."

2.name: Basil
2.flavor_text: "There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary."

2.name: Caterpillar
2.flavor_text: "Keep your tempo."

2.name: Cogsworth
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
UNWIND Your other characters gain Resist +1 (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

2.name: Cogsworth
2.text: WAIT A MINUTE Your characters with Reckless gain “{E} — Gain 1 lore.”
2.flavor_text: "This has gone far enough. I'm in charge here."

2.name: Cruella De Vil
2.text: NOW GET GOING During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
2.flavor_text: "Isn't it just gorgeous, darling? And just as stylish as I am."

2.name: Cruella De Vil
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.)
OH, NO YOU DON'T Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 {S} this turn.
2.flavor_text: "It's ink couture, darling. I wear only the best!"

2.name: Duke Weaselton
2.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
2.flavor_text: "It's Wee-sel-ton."

2.name: Gaston
2.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gaston.)
DEVELOPED BRAIN When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

2.name: Grand Pabbie
2.text: ANCIENT INSIGHT Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.
2.flavor_text: When he talks, even the sky listens.

2.name: Hiram Flaversham
2.text: ARTIFICER When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may banish one of your items to draw 2 cards.
2.flavor_text: His creations are even more wondrous with the Illuminary's resources at his fingertips.

2.name: James
2.text: NEVER, EVER LOSE SIGHT When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

2.name: Jasmine
2.text: I'M A FAST LEARNER When you play this character, remove up to 1 damage from chosen character of yours.
2.flavor_text: She may be young, but she's got the spirit of a true leader.

2.name: Judy Hopps
2.text: DON'T CALL ME CUTE When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player draws a card.
2.flavor_text: "I'll get to the bottom of what happened with that locked lorebook. You can count on me!"

2.name: Mrs. Judson
2.text: TIDY UP Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
2.flavor_text: "I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets."

2.name: Nick Wilde
2.text: IT'S CALLED A HUSTLE When you play this character, you may return an item card named Pawpsicle from your discard to your hand.
2.flavor_text: "It's criminal how good these things taste!"

2.name: Noi
2.text: HIDE AND SEEK While you have an item in play, this character gains Resist +1 and Ward. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1. Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

2.name: Owl
2.flavor_text: "For instance, based on the quality of the light and the subtle change in wind direction, I can safely say that it is time for tea."

2.name: Prince Charming
2.flavor_text: He'd searched across the Inklands for the young woman who'd stolen his heart at the ball, only to find more mysteries.

2.name: Rabbit
2.flavor_text:
Pooh: "Isn't there anybody here at all?"
Rabbit: "Nobody!"
Pooh: "Somebody's there... because somebody must have said 'Nobody.'"

2.name: Sisu
2.text: I TRUST YOU Whenever this character quests, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
2.flavor_text: No matter her shape, you can't mistake her heart.

2.name: The Nokk
2.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
2.flavor_text: As elusive as water.

2.name: Winnie the Pooh
2.text: HUNNY POT Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.
2.flavor_text: When he thought, he thought in the most thoughtful way he could think.

2.name: Falling Down the Rabbit Hole
2.text: Each player chooses one of their characters and puts them into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
2.flavor_text: Down, down, down she went, floating in a swirl of ink. How curious!

2.name: Four Dozen Eggs
2.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Your characters gain Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

2.name: Launch
2.text: Banish chosen item of yours to deal 5 damage to chosen character.
2.flavor_text: Ready... aim... coconut?

2.name: Nothing to Hide
2.text: Each opponent reveals their hand. Draw a card.
2.flavor_text: Helps you avoid unpleasant surprises.

2.name: Fang Crossbow
2.text:
CAREFUL AIM {E}, 2 {I} — Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
STAY BACK! {E}, Banish this item — Banish chosen Dragon character.

2.name: Gumbo Pot
2.text: THE BEST I'VE EVER TASTED {E} — Remove 1 damage each from up to 2 chosen characters.
2.flavor_text:
"A gift this special just got to be shared."
—James

2.name: Maurice's Workshop
2.text: LOOKING FOR THIS? Whenever you play another item, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.
2.flavor_text: The solution you need could be just a few adjustments away.

2.name: Pawpsicle
2.text:
JUMBO POP When you play this item, you may draw a card.
THAT'S REDWOOD Banish this item — Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

2.name: Sardine Can
2.text: FLIGHT CABIN Your exerted characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
2.flavor_text:
"Flight 3759 boarding now! Let's go get that lore!"
—Orville

2.name: Beast
2.text: YOU'RE NOT WELCOME HERE When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
2.flavor_text: Woe to the one who draws his gaze.

2.name: Beast
2.text: SHIELD ANOTHER Whenever one of your other characters would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.
2.flavor_text: "You'll have to go through me first."

2.name: Beast
2.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.)
IT'S BETTER THIS WAY At the start of your turn, if this character has no damage, draw a card. Otherwise, he gets +4 {S} this turn.
2.flavor_text: "It must be my destiny—to remain a beast forever."

2.name: Benja
2.text: WE HAVE A CHOICE When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.
2.flavor_text: "Don't mistake spirit for skill."

2.name: Chief Bogo
2.text: INSUBORDINATION! Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.
2.flavor_text: "We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under control—now clear the area."

2.name: Cinderella
2.text: HAVE COURAGE When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
2.flavor_text: She's always had the heart of a champion—now she'll have the skills, too.

2.name: Cinderella
2.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cinderella.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
THE SINGING SWORD Whenever you play a song, this character may challenge ready characters this turn.

2.name: Donald Duck
2.flavor_text: "You go ahead, Minnie! I'm going to see if there's any lore over here."

2.name: Eli La Bouff
2.flavor_text: "I don't suppose y'all could whip up some more magical beignets with them inkcasters?"

2.name: Goofy
2.flavor_text: It's a banner day for Sir Goofy, who is steeled to prove his mettle against anyone courting trouble—joust in case.

2.name: Hercules
2.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hercules.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
2.flavor_text: A good guy to have around when something wrecks your inkworks.

2.name: Hercules
2.flavor_text: No need to call IX-I-I!

2.name: Jafar
2.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)
NOW WHERE WERE WE? During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

2.name: Jafar
2.text: I DON'T TRUST HIM, SIRE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
2.flavor_text: "Soon you'll learn who holds the real power!"

2.name: Kronk
2.text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
SCOUT LEADER During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

2.name: Lawrence
2.text: PAYBACK While this character has no damage, he gets +4 {S}.

Wings spread wide with flame

3.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.)

3.name: Jetsam
3.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

3.flavor_text:
"It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going.
Yahoooo!"

3.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke
3.text:
WELL, NOW YOU KNOW When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

3.flavor_text:
"Believe me, studying gibberish really can take
you places!"

3.name: Milo Thatch

Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)

3.flavor_text: "You don't know what you're tampering with."

"Too late to be known as John the First, he's sure to
be known as John the Worst!"
—Sheriff of Nottingham

3.name: Robin Hood
3.flavor_text:

running."

3.name: Shenzi
3.text:
I'LL HANDLE THIS While this character is at a location, she gets +3 {S}.

3.name: Sir Hiss
3.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

3.name: Skippy
3.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

3.name: Stitch
3.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place, but welcome to
the Pride Lands all the same!"

3.name: Has Set My Heaaaaaaart . . .
3.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen item.
3.flavor_text:
He's not real smart
And yet, he's touched my little cowhide heart

3.name: I Will Find My Way
3.text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character of yours gets +2 {S} this turn. They may move to a location for free.
3.flavor_text:
I would go most anywhere
To feel like I belong

3.name: Strike a Good Match
3.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
3.flavor_text:
Please bring honor to us
Please bring honor to us all

3.name: Airfoil
3.text: I GOT TO BE GOING {E} — If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.
3.flavor_text: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.

3.name: Robin's Bow
3.text:
FOREST'S GIFT {E} — Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location.
A BIT OF A LARK Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests, you may ready this item.
3.flavor_text:
"The forest always provides just what you need."
—Robin Hood

3.name: Starlight Vial
3.text:
EFFICIENT ENERGY {E} — You pay 2 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.
TRAP 2 {I}, Banish this item — Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
3.flavor_text: In the wrong hands, this vial of magic could be disastrous.

3.name: De Vil Manor
3.flavor_text:
"They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle."
—Colonel

3.name: Fang
3.text: SURROUNDED BY WATER Characters gain Ward and Evasive while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
3.flavor_text: A nation protected by fierce assassins and their even fiercer cats.

3.name: Kuzco's Palace
3.text: CITY WALLS Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.
3.flavor_text: "Sure it's a little small, but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL!" —Kuzco

3.name: Ariel
3.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
INSPIRING VOICE Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.
3.flavor_text: Shipwrecks are great places to find lore—and hide from sharks!

3.name: Billy Bones
3.flavor_text:
"He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his
band of cutthroats."

3.name: Captain Hook
3.text:
NEMESIS During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
MAN-TO-MAN Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

3.name: Della Duck
3.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
3.flavor_text:
"I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded
Inklands be?"

3.name: HeiHei
3.text: MINDLESS WANDERING Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, each opponent loses 1 lore.
3.flavor_text: Considering the coconut.

3.name: Hydra
3.text: WATCH THE TEETH Whenever this character is dealt damage, deal that much damage to chosen opposing character.
3.flavor_text: More heads are better than one.

3.name: Jim Hawkins
3.text:
THIS IS IT! When you play this character, you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free.
TAKE THE HELM Whenever you play a location, this character may move there for free.
3.flavor_text:
"You're gonna rattle the stars, you are."
—John Silver

3.name: Jim Hawkins
3.flavor_text:
If you want a bigger reward, you've got to take
bigger risks.

3.name: Kakamora
3.text: PLUNDER When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
3.flavor_text: There's a bunch more where he came from.

3.name: Madame Medusa
3.text: THAT TERRIBLE WOMAN When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 3 {S} or less.
3.flavor_text:
"Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from
children."

3.name: Maui
3.text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
IN MA BELLY Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests, this character gets +1 {L} and loses Reckless this turn.
3.flavor_text: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"

3.name: Maui
3.text:
THIS MISSION IS CURSED This character can't ready at the start of your turn.
I GOT YOUR BACK 2 {I} — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
3.flavor_text: Always ready to make a splash.

3.name: Milo Thatch
3.text: I'M YOUR MAN! While this character is at a location, he gets +2 {S}.
3.flavor_text: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"

3.name: Moana
3.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)
WELCOME TO MY BOAT Whenever this character quests while at a location, ready all other characters here. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

3.name: Moana
3.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
3.flavor_text: No fire or storm will keep her from her goal.

3.name: Nutsy
3.flavor_text:
"Nutsy, button your beak."
—Trigger

3.name: Peter Pan
3.text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
OVER HERE, TINK While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play, this character gets +2 {S}.
3.flavor_text:
With Peter, plans often meant diving headlong into
danger.

3.name: Peter Pan
3.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
YOU'RE NEXT! Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

3.name: Prince Eric
3.text: SURPRISE MANEUVER When this character is banished, you may banish chosen character.
3.flavor_text:
The storm came out of nowhere, forcing Eric
to turn back before he reached the mysterious
structure at the edge of Lorcana.

3.name: Scroop
3.text: BRUTE While this character has damage, he gets +3 {S}.
3.flavor_text:
Always keep him in front of you. And downwind,
if possible.

3.name: Simba
3.flavor_text:
He'll join the hunt for lore after he's had a quick
snack.

3.name: Slightly
3.text:
THE FOX If you have a character named Peter Pan in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
3.flavor_text: "Pirates sure are easy to trick!"

3.name: Stitch
3.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
3.flavor_text:
"Who thought giving him power armor was a
good idea?!"
—Nani

3.name: Trigger
3.text: OLD BETSY Your characters named Nutsy get +1 {L}.
3.flavor_text:
"Criminently, Trigger! Point that peashooter the
other way."
—Sheriff of Nottingham

3.name: Webby Vanderquack
3.flavor_text:
"Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a
grappling hook!"

3.name: Divebomb
3.text: Banish one of your characters with Reckless to banish chosen character with less {S} than that character.

3.name: I've Got a Dream
3.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Gain lore equal to that location's {L}.
3.flavor_text:
Tor would like to quit and be a florist
Gunther does interior design

3.name: On Your Feet! Now!
3.text: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
3.flavor_text: "Catch them! Before they get away!"

3.name: Voyage
3.text: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.
3.flavor_text: "We were voyagers! Why'd we stop?" —Moana

3.name: Maui's Fish Hook
3.text:
IT'S MAUI TIME! If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free.
SHAPESHIFT {E}, 2 {I} — Choose one:
• Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
• Chosen character gets +3 {S} this turn.

3.name: Sumerian Talisman
3.text: SOURCE OF MAGIC During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.
3.flavor_text:
"Summoned spirit from the dark
Show thyself before this arc."
—Lena Sabrewing

3.name: Agrabah
3.flavor_text:
"Welcome to Agrabah, city of mystery, of enchantment, and the finest
merchandise this side of the river."
—Merchant

3.name: Jolly Roger
3.text:
LOOK ALIVE, YOU SWABS! Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
ALL HANDS ON DECK! Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

3.name: RLS Legacy
3.text:
THIS IS OUR SHIP Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
HEAVE TOGETHER NOW If you have a character here, you pay 2 {I} less to move a character of yours here.

3.name: Audrey Ramirez
3.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
SPARE PARTS Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.
3.flavor_text: "How'd you break this thing, anyway?"

3.name: Captain Amelia
3.text: DISCIPLINE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
3.flavor_text:
"I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon.
Hard to port, helmsman!"

3.name: Dewey
3.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
3.flavor_text: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"

3.name: Flintheart Glomgold
3.text: THEY'LL NEVER SEE IT COMING! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
3.flavor_text: "Nobody tells Flintheart Glomgold what to do!"

3.name: Genie
3.flavor_text:
"Ten thousand years will give you such a crick in
the neck!"

3.name: Gramma Tala
3.text: THERE WAS ONLY OCEAN When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
3.flavor_text:
Listen with your whole heart, and the ancestors will
guide you.

3.name: Gramma Tala
3.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.)
DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE? Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.
3.flavor_text:
She will always be with you, no matter how far your
journey takes you.

3.name: Gyro Gearloose
3.text: NOW TRY TO KEEP UP {E} — Put an item card from your discard on the top of your deck.
3.flavor_text: "Maybe the bulb tech will be less evil this time..."

3.name: Huey
3.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
THREE NEPHEWS Whenever this character quests, if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play, you may draw 3 cards.
3.flavor_text: "This looks like part of a larger crystal!"

3.name: King Louie
3.flavor_text:
"Hold up, cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some
sweet beats?"

3.name: Kit Cloudkicker
3.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

3.name: Kit Cloudkicker
3.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
3.flavor_text:
Thrilled to have his airfoil back, he launched into
the Inklands.

3.name: Louie
3.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
3.flavor_text: "Found the last one!"

3.name: Maid Marian
3.text: HIGHBORN LADY When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
3.flavor_text: She makes every space more beautiful.

3.name: Mama Odie
3.text: THIS GOING TO BE GOOD Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
3.flavor_text: "You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need."

3.name: Pluto
3.flavor_text:
Pluto's job was to keep Gustav's attention so
Minnie could get to the cave.

3.name: Rufus
3.text: TOO OLD TO BE CHASING MICE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
3.flavor_text: "Faith is a bluebird you see from afar."

3.name: Scrooge McDuck
3.text:
I'M GOING HOME! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
I DIDN'T GET RICH BY BEING STUPID During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play an item for free.
3.flavor_text: He can make money anywhere.

3.name: Scrooge McDuck
3.text: TREASURE FINDER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
3.flavor_text:
A strange new world is the perfect place to make a
strange new fortune!

3.name: The Queen
3.text: CALCULATING AND VAIN Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
3.flavor_text:
She has only one question, and she'd better like
the answer.

3.name: Tinker Bell
3.text: I CAN USE THAT Whenever one of your items is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
3.flavor_text: She lives in a world of possibilities.

3.name: Wendy Darling
3.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

3.name: Distract
3.text: Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn. Draw a card.

3.name: Friend Like Me
3.text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each player puts the top 3 cards of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
3.flavor_text: You got some power in your corner now

3.name: How Far I'll Go
3.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

3.name: Repair
3.text: Remove up to 3 damage from one of your locations or characters.
3.flavor_text:
"I'm thinkin' about opening a shop here. What do you
think?"

3.name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
3.text: SEEKING KNOWLEDGE Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
3.flavor_text:
"It can point you toward lost lore, but if you're not careful,
it'll lead you off a cliff."
—Venturo, an Illumineer

3.name: Heart of Te Fiti
3.text: CREATE LIFE {E}, 2 {I} — Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
3.flavor_text: It takes a pure heart to calm the raging storm within.

3.name: Lucky Dime
3.text: NUMBER ONE {E}, 2 {I} — Choose a character of yours and gain lore equal to their {L}.
3.flavor_text: This one simple coin changed Scrooge's life forever.

3.name: Scrooge's Top Hat
3.text: BUSINESS EXPERTISE {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
3.flavor_text: Just the thing to top off another brilliant deal.

3.name: Vault Door
3.text: SEALED AWAY Your locations and characters at locations gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
3.flavor_text:
Only Scrooge knows about this vault. And he's going to
keep it that way.

3.name: Belle's House
3.text: LABORATORY If you have a character here, you pay 1 {I} less to play items.
3.flavor_text: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.

3.name: McDuck Manor
3.flavor_text:
"It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!"
—Webby Vanderquack

3.name: Motunui
3.text: REINCARNATION Whenever a character is banished while here, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

3.name: Chief Tui
3.flavor_text: "Look at our home! There is no better place to be."

3.name: Eeyore
3.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
3.flavor_text: "Not much of a roadblock, but I suppose I'll do."

3.name: Gustav the Giant
3.text:
ALL TIED UP This character enters play exerted and can't ready at the start of your turn.
BREAK FREE During your turn, whenever one of your other characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character.

3.name: Hades
3.text: CALL THE TITANS {E} — Ready your Titan characters.
3.flavor_text:
"Brothers! Titans! Look at you in your squalid prison.
Who put you down there?"

3.name: Helga Sinclair
3.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
3.flavor_text: "That was an order, not a suggestion. Let's go!"

3.name: John Silver
3.text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1 {L}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
3.flavor_text: "I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose."

3.name: Kida
3.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
3.flavor_text: She's seen strange things before, but nothing like this.

3.name: Little John
3.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Little John.)
OKAY, BIG SHOT While this character is exerted, your characters with Bodyguard gain Resist +1 and get +1 {L}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

3.name: Little John
3.text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
DISGUISED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

3.name: Lythos
3.text:
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
STONE SKIN {E} — Chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn.
3.flavor_text: "Crush Zeus!"

3.name: Mickey Mouse
3.text: LET'S TAKE A LOOK This character gets +1 {S} for each location you have in play.
3.flavor_text:
Mickey knew just where to start searching for
the Sorcerer's Hat, but he didn't expect it to be
guarded.

3.name: Mickey Mouse
3.text: SOUND THE CALL {E}, 2 {I} — Play a character for free.

3.name: Minnie Mouse
3.text: JOURNEY While this character is at a location, she gets +2 {S}.
3.flavor_text: She'll never cave under pressure.

3.name: Mr. Smee
3.text: OH DEAR, DEAR, DEAR At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted and you don't have a Captain character in play, deal 1 damage to this character.
3.flavor_text: "Catch those little—OUCH!"

3.name: Mufasa
3.flavor_text: Even his name makes enemies quiver in fear.

3.name: Nala
3.flavor_text: "Pinned ya again."

3.name: Pyros
3.text: ERUPTION During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready chosen character.
3.flavor_text: "Melt Zeus!"

3.name: Razoul
3.text: LOOKY HERE While this character has no damage, he gets +2 {S}.
3.flavor_text:
"There's no princess here to save you this time,
street rat."

3.name: Robin Hood
3.flavor_text:
"You call this an ambush? Tsk, tsk. It's barely a
bushwhack."

3.name: Robin Hood
3.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.)
SKILLED COMBATANT During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.
THE GOOD OF OTHERS When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

3.name: Sheriff of Nottingham
3.text: TAXES SHOULD HURT Whenever you discard a card, you may deal 1 damage to chosen opposing character.
3.flavor_text:
The thirteenth Rule of Villainy: Take everything you
can, but do it with a smile.

3.name: Simba
3.text: STEP DOWN OR FIGHT When you play this character and whenever he banishes another character in a challenge during your turn, you may choose one: • Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard 2 cards. • Deal 2 damage to chosen character.
3.flavor_text: He's ready to restore the Pride Lands to their former glory.

3.name: Simba
3.text: TRIUMPHANT STANCE During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, chosen opposing character can't challenge during their next turn.
3.flavor_text:
With dangers multiplying all around, the pride needs
its guardian.

3.name: Thaddeus E. Klang
3.text: MY TEETH ARE SHARPER Whenever this character quests while at a location, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
3.flavor_text: "Soon the bells will ring in the sound of your doom!"

3.name: And Then Along Came Zeus
3.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 5 damage to chosen character or location.
3.flavor_text:
He hurled his thunderbolt—He zapped
Locked those suckers in a vault—They're trapped
And on his own stopped chaos in its tracks

3.name: Ba-Boom!
3.text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.
3.flavor_text: Bigger than your average boom!

3.name: Olympus Would Be That Way
3.text: Your characters get +3 {S} while challenging a location this turn.
3.flavor_text:
"Now that I set you free, what is the first thing you are
going to do?"
—Hades

3.name: Rise of the Titans
3.text: Banish chosen location or item.
3.flavor_text:
"Oh, we're in trouble, big trouble!"
—Hermes

3.name: Captain Hook's Rapier
3.text:
GET THOSE SCURVY BRATS! During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may pay 1 {I} to draw a card.
LET'S HAVE AT IT! Your characters named Captain Hook gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

3.name: Gizmosuit
3.text: CYBERNETIC ARMOR Banish this item — Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
3.flavor_text:
It stands in the Hall of Lorcana, waiting for someone to
speak the secret words.

3.name: Map of Treasure Planet
3.text:
KEY TO THE PORTAL {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next location you play this turn.
SHOW THE WAY You pay 1 {I} less to move your characters to a location.
3.flavor_text:
"Gentlemen, this must be kept under lock and key."
—Captain Amelia

3.name: Maui's Place of Exile
3.text: ISOLATED Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
3.flavor_text: Nothing but boulders and sand—easy to miss.

3.name: Nottingham
3.flavor_text:
Sir Hiss: "I say, sire, your mother's castle will be the perfect place to set up our scheme!"
Prince John: "Mommy!"

3.name: The Bayou
3.text: SHOW ME THE WAY Whenever a character quests while here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
3.flavor_text: A place to find what you need, not just what you want.

3.name: Chernabog
3.text:
THE POWER OF EVIL For each character card in your discard, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
SUMMON THE SPIRITS When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

3.name: Kida
3.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.)
PERHAPS WE CAN SAVE OUR FUTURE When you play this character, all characters get -3 {S} until the start of your next turn.

3.name: Pride Lands
3.text:
WE ARE ALL CONNECTED Characters get +2 {W} while here.
LION HOME If you have a Prince or King character here, you pay 1 {I} less to play characters.

3.name: Jafar
3.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jafar.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
POWER BEYOND MEASURE During your turn, while this character is exerted, whenever you draw a card, gain 1 lore.

3.name: Maleficent
3.text:
DARK KNOWLEDGE Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.
DIVINATION During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

3.name: The Sorcerer's Hat
3.text: INCREDIBLE ENERGY {E}, 1 {I} — Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

3.name: Morph
3.text: MIMICRY You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

3.name: Ursula
3.text: WHAT A DEAL Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.

3.name: Kuzco's Palace
3.text: CITY WALLS Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.

3.name: Captain Hook
3.text:
NEMESIS During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
MAN-TO-MAN Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

3.name: Peter Pan
3.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
YOU'RE NEXT! Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

3.name: RLS Legacy
3.text:
THIS IS OUR SHIP Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
HEAVE TOGETHER NOW If you have a character here, you pay 2 {I} less to move a character of yours here.

3.name: Gramma Tala
3.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.)
DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE? Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.

3.name: Scrooge McDuck

Sing Together 6 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 6 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent loses 2 lore. You gain 2 lore.
4.flavor_text:
Give me a career
As a buccaneer

4.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

"By order of the Emperor, one man from every family must serve in the Imperial Army."
—Chi Fu

• Banish chosen Hero character.
• Ready chosen Villain character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
4.flavor_text: It's a once-in-a-lifetime view.

4.text: STRENGTH OF MIND 1 {I} — Chosen character here gets +1 {S} this turn.

4.name: Anna
4.text: I WAS BORN READY If you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
4.flavor_text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.

4.name: Anna
4.text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 {L} this turn.
4.flavor_text: Make sure you know what's truly important and be willing to fight for it.

4.name: Ariel
4.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
THE GIRL WHO HAS EVERYTHING While you have more items in play than each opponent, this character gets +2 {L}.

4.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
PRESERVER Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects.
ROYAL INVENTORY {E} one of your items — Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

4.name: Aurora
4.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
4.flavor_text: Her music fills the Illuminary's gardens with joy and light.

4.name: Dang Hu
4.text: YOU BETTER TALK FAST Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
4.flavor_text: You can find villainy in the most unexpected places.

4.name: Fa Li
4.flavor_text: When far from home, Mulan often thinks of her calming presence.

4.name: Flounder
4.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
I'M NOT A GUPPY If you have a character named Ariel in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
4.flavor_text: "Ariel, Ariel! You won't believe what I found!"

4.name: Hades
4.flavor_text: "On this cute little plot Ursula tentacles are sold a mile away. That sneaky sea witch… Wait! I can use this thing. While you keep those hateful Illumineers busy, I can carry out my plan."

4.name: Hans
4.text: ROYAL SCHEMES When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.
4.flavor_text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula-all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.

4.name: Iduna
4.text: ENDURING LOVE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
4.flavor_text:
"Come my darling, homeward bound
When all is lost, then all is found."

4.name: John Silver
4.flavor_text: "There are strange things on the edge of the map: sea witches, entangled glimmers, and so on. I'll stick with my ship, thank you very much."

4.name: Olaf
4.text:
Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.)
CARROTS ALL AROUND! Whenever he quests, each of your other characters gets +{S} equal to this character's {S} this turn.

4.name: Olaf
4.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
4.flavor_text: "Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way, he'll be caught in that storm!"

4.name: Pascal
4.text: COLORFUL TACTICS When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
4.flavor_text: If you want to find something hidden, get someone who's an expert at hiding.

4.name: Prince Phillip
4.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
BEST DEFENSE Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

4.flavor_text: "Pascal! A new flower for the wall!"

4.text: LET ME SEE When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
4.flavor_text: "Wow. This is special. This is very, very unusual."

4.name: Sisu
4.flavor_text: "It may feel impossible, but sometimes, you just have to take the first step, even before you're ready."

4.text: CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK {E} — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

4.flavor_text:
"A good, hot meal will set you right as rain."
- Mrs. Potts

4.text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.)

4.text:
SUPERIOR SWIMMER During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

-Raya

Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)

4.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gets -3 {S} this turn.
4.flavor_text:
I know you
I walked with you once upon a dream

4.text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 2 item cards from your discard into your hand.
4.flavor_text: How many wonders can one cavern hold?

AWAKEN {E} — Put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

-Hades

P1.name: Mickey Mouse
P1.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
P1.flavor_text: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

P1.text:

P1.text: FREEZE {E} – Exert chosen opposing character.
P1.flavor_text: Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an unfamiliar new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

P1.flavor_text: When she stops by, misery is company.

P1.text: DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen opposing character.
P1.flavor_text: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.
